title: Draconic Ancestry
content:
Druids, and Monks will use Wisdom. Sorcerers, Bards, Paladins, and Warlocks will use Charisma, and Intelligence for Wizards. Notes and tips go here.

All Traits and Features Ability Drain ♦ Abjuration Savant ♦ Absorb Elements ♦ Acolyte of Nature ♦ Action Surge ♦ Adamantine Skin ♦ Additional Ki Point ♦ Additional Proficiencies ♦ Additional Rage Charge ♦ Advanced Unarmoured Movement ♦ Agile Chassis ♦ Agonizing Blast ♦ Animal Aspect ♦ Arcane Shoot ♦ Arcane Shot ♦ Arcane Ward ♦ Archery ♦ Arctic ♦ Ar
